settings.content:
FEATURES

  • 8" 2-Way Speaker for Marine & Motorsports
  • IP65 Marine Grade Compliant Specifications, 100% UV Stable
  • Injection Molded Composite ASA
  • Integrated Digital LED Lights
  • Speaker Front Silicone Cover Protectors Included
  • Sold as Pair

COMPONENTS

  • Coaxial Separate with Floating Design
  • Neodymiun Magnet
  • Compression Horn Driver
  • Copper Ring Utilized in Motor Structure
  • for Enhanced Far Field Performance

MATERIALS

  • Kevlar Cone
  • Santoprene Surround
  • Aluminum Molded Basket with UV Protection Coating

PACKAGING INCLUDES

  • 2 x 8" 2-Way Full Range Marine Speakers for All Elements
  • 2 x 1.5M 18ga Speaker Input Wires With Water Resistant Terminals
  • 2 x 1.5M 22ga Digital LED Input Wires With Water Resistant Terminals
  • 12 x Stainless Steel Screws With M4 Hexagonal Head (4mm Hex Tool)
  • 2 x Speaker Front Silicone Cover Protectors

SPECIFICATIONS

  • IP65 Marine Grade Compliant Specifications, 100% UV Stable
  • Injection Molded Composite ASA
  • Integrated Digital LED Lights
  • Speaker Front Silicone Cover Protectors Included
  • Sold as Pair

settings.details:
NVY-M8DC/BK

The NVY speakers serie offer high-class audio quality, blending elegance with advanced sound technology. Designed to fit seamlessly in any environment, these speakers deliver clear, rich sound that enhances every space, making them the perfect choice for those who value both style and premium performance.
